Quick Start¶

This is a quick introduction to most of the components in our system.

Important Components

  • Kasten Quick Start
    • Policies
    • Application Restore

Kasten Quick Start¶

Policies¶

To protect applications, simple click "Create New Policy" after clicking Manage Policies.

Application Restore¶

Via the Namespaces section of the dashboard, select "Restore App"
